3â€¢1006 TESTS.
Tests of the CONELRAD alerting and operating systems of the
noncommercial educational EM and the international broadcast services
may be conducted at appropriate intervals. Reports of the results of such
tests may be required in a form to be prescribed by the Commission.
3.1007 LOG ENTRIES.
Appropriate entries of all CONELRAD tests, drills or operations
shall be made in the station log*
